Game.Developer: Sierra Entertainment, Inc., Universal Interactive Inc.
Game.Notes: The Crash Super Pack brings together two of the best kart racing games available for your GBA -- both of which happen to have Crash Bandicoot, one of the wildest characters in gaming! With Crash Nitro Kart you'll race against Cortex and his minions in hopped-up kart racing action. In Crash: N-Hanced you'll reach incredible speeds and face the wildest obstacles on the fastest tracks.
